    • Constructor Detail

      • SPiDConfigurationBuilder

        public SPiDConfigurationBuilder(android.content.Context context,
                                java.lang.String clientID,
                                java.lang.String clientSecret,
                                java.lang.String appURLScheme,
                                java.lang.String serverURL)
        Initializes a SPiDConfigurationBuilder with the required fields needed to create a SPiDConfiguration object
        Parameters:
        context - The application context
        clientID - The client id
        clientSecret - The client secret
        appURLScheme - The app url scheme used for redirects
        serverURL - The SPiD server to connect to

      • SPiDConfigurationBuilder

        public SPiDConfigurationBuilder(java.util.Properties properties)
        Initializes a SPiDConfigurationBuilder from a Properties object
        Parameters:
        properties - The properties to initialize the builder from. Required fields are clientID, clientSecret, signSecret, appURLScheme and serverURL

      • build

        public SPiDConfiguration build()
        Builds a SPiDConfiguration object from the supplied values. It also check all that all mandatory values are set and generates default values for non-mandatory values that are missing.
        Returns:
        A SPiDConfiguration object
